title: Implement AI-powered deployment gate verification system
description: Build intelligent deployment gating that uses AI to analyze code quality, test coverage, and security vulnerabilities before allowing production releases
iWant: AI-powered verification gates with automated quality assessment
soThat: I can prevent defective releases and maintain 99.5% deployment success rate
acceptanceCriteria: AI analyzes code quality metrics and blocks releases below 85% quality score
Security vulnerability scanning completes within 10 minutes
Test coverage verification ensures minimum 80% coverage before deployment
Deployment gate decisions are logged with detailed reasoning and recommendations
